question:
You work a part-time job in a company and the company posted an advert seeking a person for a full-time position. Write a letter to your manager requesting to apply for advertised position. In this letter, you should:

* Why you want to apply.
* What your future goals are.
* Why it would be beneficial for the company.
text: I am wiring this letter to show my willingness to apply for the full-time past which was advertised in the daily newspaper.

Currently,I am working in this company on a part-time basis for the last four months . However, I wanted to join a full-time position but there was no vacant past when I applied. Thus, I want to apply for this job at this time.

I am working as an assistant in this organisation and I have completed my  academic qualification as well. Hence, I find myself suitable for the vacancy of a storekeeper in the firm and I want to grasp this opportunity.

It would be beneficial for the company as I am already aware of the norms of the firm and you don't need to spend huge costs on training. Therefore, it would be really commendable if you could please allow me to apply for this position.
Looking forward to getting a positive reply from your side.
